DOC.brief_summary: To monitor the long-term performance of the CE Marked NeoChord Artificial Chordae Delivery System
DOC.criteria: Grade 3+ or 4+ mitral valve regurgitation Heavily calcified valves Valvular retraction with severely reduced mobility Active bacterial endocarditis Complex mechanism of MR (leaflet perforation, etc.) Significant tethering of leaflets Inflammatory valve disease
